segments.text: I notice the woman is so focused on that plate, like it’s the only thing that matters.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just spilling everywhere, and she doesn’t even blink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so sneaky, and she has no clue.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I love how the boy is balancing on that stool, reaching for the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s like a little secret mission they’re on together.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it’s about to tip, but he’s so determined.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they’ll get away with it before she notices.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is making a mess, but the kids don’t seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they’re going to have a great time with those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is so full of life and mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR
